item.title: Australian Government Agencies Failing to Keep Up With Cyber Security Change
item.description:
Cyber security maturity declines among Australian government agencies in 2024, as legacy IT systems hinder progress under the Essential Eight framework.

Go to Source

item.title: UK’s New AI Action Plan Aims to Position Country as a Global Powerhouse
item.description:
Recommendations in the 50-point plan include increasing public compute capacity twentyfold, creating a training data library, and building AI hubs in deindustrialised areas.

Go to Source

item.title: Australian IT Sector Maintains Strong Employment Outlook for 2025
item.description:
IT hiring intentions remain strong, though competition for jobs could be fierce.

Go to Source

item.title: IBM’s Acquisition of HashiCorp Investigated by UK Competition Authority
item.description:
HashiCorp provides hybrid and multi-cloud lifecycle management products that could assist IBM’s customers with their AI ambitions.
